Description: The kitchen sink has a persistent leak that needs fixing. The client has tried to tighten the connections but the leak persists.
Several outlets in the living room are not working. The client suspects there might be an issue with the wiring.
The client needs custom shelves built in the study room. They have specific dimensions and design in mind.
The client wants to repaint the living room and fix some minor wall cracks. They need help with both tasks.
The air conditioning unit is not cooling properly. It might need a refrigerant refill or a filter change.
The living room light fixture is flickering and needs to be checked for loose wiring.
